I&#39;ve created a list of alternative Vancian-like spells for my Wizard Mana hack - what do you guys think? What should I add? Remove? Edit?<br />Thanks

<div id='comment z12msjdgmmyxdz2ej22fdpzzpmbig5fb504'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/116013665970125878211_photo.jpg'> Yochai Gal</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-09-12 01:00:49 (edited: 2017-09-12 01:00:49)</cite></p>
        <p>Add, though there might be some worth swapping out. It&#39;s certainly not a complete list, I just compiled from memory spells I enjoyed in other systems. D&amp;D has tons of overlap with their spells; for simplicity&#39;s sake I&#39;d like no more than 5-8 spells a Level, and as little overlap as possible (Shapechange = Polymorph = Mimic, etc). <br />If you have a spell you&#39;d love to see in DW, please let me know and I&#39;ll try to adapt it using my MANA rules.</p>
</div>
